output.name: pid
output.narrative: PID of the process

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

output.name: Locale
output.narrative: Blue Prism Locale setting

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Value
input.narrative: The value you want to use for the parameter. Use the import collection feature in your collection to get the schema.

output.name: Name
output.narrative: The name of the environment variable that was read.

output.name: Type
output.narrative: The type of the environment variable that was read.

output.name: Description
output.narrative: The description of the environment variable that was read.

output.name: Value
output.narrative: The value of the environment variable that was read.

stage.name: Description
stage.initialvalue: This is my very first description.

decision.expression: [Name (1)]=[Read Name] AND [Type]=[Read Type] AND [Description]=[Read Description] AND [Value.Text]=[Read Value]

output.name: Error
output.narrative: The error that appeared when attempting to click apply.
